argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modval | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) = ( A - ( B x. ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rpre | |- ( B e. RR+ -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_refldivcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_remulcld | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( B x. ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_resubcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ ( B x. ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) ) e. RR ) -> ( A - ( B x. ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A - ( B x. ( |_ ` ( A / B ) ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod B ) e. RR ) |
